title.narrative: Preparation for the Launch Own Dairy Brand in the Market-sweeta

description.narrative:
Olkalou Dairy(2016) ltd is a public Ltd Company fully owned and led by farmers. The Company has currently developed a 3 year Strategic plan which focus is to transform the business model from milk collection and chilling into a milk processor and at the same time double the milk intake from the current average of 50.000 litres/day to 100.000litres a day in the next three years (goal 2020 is 100.000 liters/day) . To achieve this,the Company seeks to engage the services of a Co-packer(Cooperative) in order to launch its brand in the market. After successfully launching the product,Olkalou will mobilize capital to invest in own factory plant in order to further increase the reliability of their brand in the market. This 2018 action plan therefore focuses on establishing a long term marketing strategy for Olkalou in order to ensure a successful brand introduction to the market by the end of 2018.
Business Hiring Marketing Officers Enable the oragnization to set a ground for establisment of own brand in the market Business Brand Design Developing A brand created and secured Business Marketing/promotional material:banners,posters for the distributors, Branded Thirts&caps,branding the offices Development of Marketing Materials that will ensure successful launch of own brand in the market Organisational Development 2days training and team building activity with the board and Management Staff Enhance team cohesion and mutual understanding between the Board and the management team Organisational Development Exchange visit Kiambaa/Meru Dairy for an exposure visit The board to get challenged to change their mindset concerning moving into processing

Long term goal is to increase daily milk intake from 50.000 l/day to 100.000 l/day at the end of 2020; and process at least 50% of the milk into processed milk (pasteurisation) . Short term goal: Improve the marketing and branding of processed milk in 2018, to proof that Olkaloau can enter the processed milk market as a player and get ready for investing on more processing facilities in 2019.
